metadata.title: CVE-2018-5686 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In MuPDF 1.12.0, there is an infinite loop vulnerability and applicationhang in the pdf_parse_array function (pdf/pdf-parse.c) because EOF is notconsidered. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause adenial of service via a crafted pdf file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5686` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.13.0+ds1-1
mupdf-tools - 1.13.0+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.0+ds1-1').
